title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
---

### Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid

**Product Name:** Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid

**Ideal for:** Ages 6 and up

**Product Type:** Toys for Boys and Girls

**Official Bakugan Product:** Yes

**Manufacturer Commitment:** Spin Master Care Commitment

---

#### **Product Features:**

- **Customizable Arena:** Create your own battle arena with the customizable arena feature, perfect for personalizing your gaming experience.
- **Built-in Phone Holder:** Keep your phone handy during intense battles with the built-in phone holder.
- **Sparring Totem Included:** Boost your Bakugan's energy with the included sparring totem.
- **Multi-Part Ball Linking System:** Expand your collection and customize your playsets with a multi-part ball linking system.
- **Upgradeable with Training Sets:** Enhance your Bakugan with training sets (sold separately) for even more fun and gameplay options.
- **Exclusive Item:** The Special Attack Dragonoid, an exclusive action figure that adds an extra layer of excitement to your battles.
- **Special Attack Bakugan:** Equip your Bakugan with the special attack feature to gain an edge in battles.
- **Gate Card Transformations:** Your Bakugan can transform when rolled on gate cards, adding a thrilling element to each battle.
- **Character Card:** Learn more about the Bakugan's strengths and weaknesses with the included character card.
- **Special Attack Card:** Use this card to activate special attack modes during battles.
- **Training Set Compatibility:** Your arena and playset are compatible with training sets, allowing you to level up your gaming experience.
- **Bakugan Token:** Collectible Bakugan token for additional gameplay benefits.
- **Roll and Display Base:** Display your Bakugan on the roll and display base for added fun.
- **Online Game Code Included:** Get ready to battle in the Roblox game with the special code included in your package.
- **Collectible Aspects:** Special attack variants and battle packs to collect and keep coming back for more.

---

**Package Contents:**

- 1 Deluxe Arena
- 1 Special Attack Bakugan
- 2 Clan Flags
- 3 Sparring Totems
- 1 Character Card
- 1 Special Attack Card
- 2 Gate Cards
- 1 XL Rip Cord
- 1 Bakugan Token

---

**Additional Information:**

- **Spin Master Care Commitment:** We are committed to providing quality and safe products for your enjoyment.
- **Ideal for:** Boys and girls who love action and collectibles.
- **Action Figures:** Enjoy the thrill of playing with action figures that can transform and battle.
- **Collectibles:** Expand your collection with special attack variants and battle packs.

---

Join the Bakugan Battle Arena and experience the thrill of battle with the Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid!
